rooms.description: Spacious entrance with reception area, incorporating Art Deco motifs and geometric patterns in wall finishes.
Open plan living space combining dining and living areas with elegant Art Deco furniture, bold accents, and symmetrical design.
Fully functional kitchen designed in Art Deco style featuring streamlined cabinetry, geometric tiles, and modern appliances integrated with traditional Indian design elements.
Cozy guest room with dedicated en-suite bathroom following Vastu principles for enhanced energy flow.
Primary ground floor bathroom incorporating Art Deco tiles and fixtures with efficient water usage design.

openings.description: The main entrance is placed at the south-east corner as per Vastu guidelines, ensuring a welcoming and positive energy flow.
Two-car garage door at the north-west corner providing convenient access while aligning with Vastu principles.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an attached en-suite bathroom, designed in Art Deco style with intricate detailing and luxury finishes.
Secondary master bedroom featuring modern Art Deco aesthetics, ensuring privacy and comfort.
Brightly lit child's room with playful Art Deco accents integrated with Vastu principles for optimal energy flow.
Additional child bedroom designed to be cosy and vibrant, incorporating natural lighting as per Vastu guidelines.
Common bathroom with contemporary fixtures and finishes, designed to complement the Art Deco style of the townhouse.

openings.description: Balcony on the west side providing outdoor space and aligning with Vastu recommendations for relaxation and positive energy.

rooms.description: Multi-functional study and office area designed with Art Deco elements and functional storage solutions.
Extra bedroom that can serve as a guest room or additional living space, designed with attention to Vastu principles.
Small bathroom designed for convenience and utility, complementing the functional design of the upper floor.

openings.description: A terrace providing a private outdoor space with views and adhering to Vastu guidelines for relaxation and social interaction.
